author: Russ Shaw
title: Ensuring Europe’s tech startups survive the pandemic benefits us all
description: The last few weeks have seen unprecedented turbulence for startups. Despite years of effort and resources invested into building thriving tech hubs throughout Europe, the scale of the coronavirus pandemic has revealed the relative fragility of these smaller b…
